text:
# City Council Meeting Minutes
## October 15, 2024

### Attendees
- Mayor Jane Smith (Chair)
- Council Member Bob Johnson
- Council Member Maria Garcia
- Council Member Tom Williams
- City Manager David Brown

### Agenda Items

#### 1. Approval of Previous Minutes
Motion to approve September 2024 minutes passed unanimously.

#### 2. Technology Infrastructure RFP Discussion
City Manager Brown presented the draft RFP for the technology infrastructure upgrade project. The council discussed the scope and timeline:
- RFP to be published November 1, 2024
- Proposals due December 15, 2024
- Contract award anticipated January 2025
- Project completion target: June 2025

Council Member Garcia requested that the RFP include requirements for local vendor preference. Motion approved 4-0.

#### 3. Water Treatment Plant Update
Public Works Director reported that engineering firm selection is in progress. Three firms have been shortlisted for final interviews.

#### 4. Public Comments
Resident John Doe expressed support for the technology upgrade, citing recent issues with online permit applications.

### Next Meeting
November 19, 2024 at 6:00 PM
